file_content.text: This is Darth Malgus, receiving your signal. You may return to Vaiken Spacedock; the threat is ended.
This is Master Satele Shan, receiving your signal. Well done. Rendezvous at Carrick Station for debriefing.
I will speak only once. You are bold to venture aboard this ship, and you are a fool to seek confrontation.
The Empire must be cleansed. It is the only way to glory.
The age of the Republic and the Jedi is over.
